english.segment1: there is something that i'd like to say. but i'm running in my brain. and my mouth is stuck on walk
english.segment2: there is one thing that is true. that i fell in love with you. and that's alright
english.segment3: i can't sleep at night. wide awake i'm waiting for here for you. just one more day. i'll be the man that god has made for you
english.segment4: wedding bells are ringing. i can see the light. wedding bells are ringing. you by my side
english.segment5: there is one thing that i'd like to ask. but my hands are kinda sweaty. and my heart beats so fast. throw the question right your way. Genny will you marry me. can't you see
english.segment6: i can't sleep at night. wide awake im waiting for here for you. just one more day. i'll be the man that god has made for you
english.segment7: wedding bells are ringing. i can see the light. wedding bells are ringing. you by my side
